Plot: The Wheel of Time turns and Ages come and pass. What was, what will be, and what is, may yet fall under the Shadow. Let the Dragon ride again on the winds of time.
Characters: Rand al'Thor, Nynaeve al'Meara, Egwene al'Vere, Perrin Aybara, Al'Lan Mandragoran, Matrim Cauthon, Moiraine Damodred, Min Farshaw, Elayne Trakand, Siuan Sanche, Loial, Thom Merrilin, Padan Fain, Ba'alzamon, Hurin, Liandrin, Verin Mathwin, Lord Ingtar Shinowa, Bayle Domon, Lanfear, Geofram Bornhald
